message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 60-40 split, with me getting the bigger share this time, is a fair starting point. Let's see if we can work something out!
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
Let's split it evenly this time.  We're both losing value with every round, so a 50/50 split is the most logical way to maximize our gains.
